attributes.action: Teachers to sit the same exams as pupils
attributes.additional_details:
To introduce a national system where all school teachers are required to sit the same exam papers as their pupils (GCSE & A-level).
This should be required annually in the subject exams that the teachers have taught that year.  The results should then be used by the school to assist teacher performance review & development.  The results should also be available for parents and pupils.
